sig_info: Gwenpool’s read enough comics to know that the main character doesn’t die, preventing her from losing more than 90 to 65.03% of her current health per hit from Special Attacks. She also reduces her opponent's Defensive Ability Accuracy, based on her current combo count.

Duckslug Editorial
Defensive Ability Accuracy reduction is 2% per hit in combo count. 100% reduction at 50 hits.

ALL ATTACKS: 3% chance to Stun per Bleed active on target, lasting for 0.75 seconds.
30% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 80.91 Direct Damage over 6 seconds.
HEAVY ATTACKS: If target isn't Bleeding when the last strike hits, it has a 5% Chance to cause Bleed, doing 80.91 Direct Damage over 6 seconds.
If target is already Bleeding, the attack instead gains a 100% chance to convert one existing Bleed into a Bleed causing 435 Direct Damage, over 27 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: This attack Incinerates the enemy, dealing 100.05 Energy Damage over 14 seconds. This effect also removes Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50% while it's active.
When this effect expires, it has a 100% chance to consume 1 Bleed effect to reapply itself.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict an Enervate Debuff, preventing the opponent from gaining Power when struck for 7 seconds.
When this effect expires, it has a 100% chance to consume 1 Bleed effect to reapply itself.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing 1 Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 4800 for 16 seconds.
When this effect expires, it has a 100% chance to consume 1 Bleed effect to reapply itself.

SPECIAL ATTACK 1: This attack Incinerates the enemy, dealing 3611 Energy Damage over 14 seconds. This effect also removes Perfect Block Chance and reduces Block Proficiency by 50% while it's active.
When this effect expires, it has a 100% chance to consume 1 Bleed effect to reapply itself.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict an Enervate Debuff, preventing the opponent from gaining Power when struck for 7 seconds.
When this effect expires, it has a 100% chance to consume 1 Bleed effect to reapply itself.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, removing 1 Armor Up Buff and reducing Armor Rating by 6450 for 16 seconds.
When this effect expires, it has a 100% chance to consume 1 Bleed effect to reapply itself.

sig_info: Gwenpool’s read enough comics to know that the main character doesn’t die, preventing her from losing more than 82.24 to 51.94% of her current health per hit from Special Attacks. She also reduces her opponent's Defensive Ability Accuracy, based on her current combo count.

Duckslug Editorial
Defensive Ability Accuracy reduction is 2% per hit in combo count. 100% reduction at 50 hits.
